featured.text: Showing great talent in painting, Moran was soon hired as an illustrator at Scribner’s Monthly, and later appointed chief illustrator by age 34.
What can be inferred from the passage? (A) Scribner’s Monthly was a magazine promoting national parks.

definition.zh_def: 一種出版商，專門出版文學作品和學術書籍。
definition.en_def: A publisher known for publishing literary works and scholarly books.
definition.example: Scribner has published many classic novels over the years.
